titleStmt.title: The terrible and deserued death of Francis Rauilliack shewing the manner of his strange torments at his execution, vpon Fryday the 25. of May last past, for the murther of the late French King, Henry the fourth. Together with an abstract out of diuers proclamations, and edicts, now concerning the state of France. As it was printed in French in three seuerall bookes published by authoritie. 1610.

The terrible and deserued death of Francis Rauilliack shewing the manner of his strange torments at his execution, vpon Fryday the 25. of May last past, for the murther of the late French King, Henry the fourth. Together with an abstract out of diuers proclamations, and edicts, now concerning the state of France. As it was printed in French in three seuerall bookes published by authoritie. 1610.
titleStmt.author: R. E., fl. 1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Blower and E. Allde] for William Barley, and Iohn Baylie,

notesStmt.note: Blower printed the 1st quire, Allde the rest--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
